excerpt: "ZEXPRWIRE , The Tripedia Foundation initiative has developed a new concept to serve the travel industry dubbed the Artificial Intelligence Travel Designer. According to the developers of Tripedia, it can solve the tourism market issues brought about by the centralized Online Travel Agencies."
